Author: hirebits
Title: [ANN] [Small Cap Utility Token] HireBits: Platform for the on-demand economy
Body: HireBits assumes the uberisation of different kinds of workforces... Dissimilar to fiverr or freelance, which pass off underpricing as freedom.  Our intention is to create an employee friendly platform where the goal is not to bid lower than others but to be the person with the best credentials to address the problem. We do that with Intelligent Matching.  Our experience and research indicates that the problem is the absence of trusted digital platforms for focused hiring... we aim to be that platform.

Author: s2sallbygrace
Title: [ANN] [Small Cap Utility Token] HireBits: Platform for the on-demand economy
Body: yes that is true,the major hurdles is the way how they hire people today, like hiring an employee for a contractual basis and not giving proper employees benefits. Do you think you can come up with the solution to this?

Author: goodvibes05
Title: [ANN] [Small Cap Utility Token] HireBits: Platform for the on-demand economy
Body: It's like an employment agency but the difference is your company is incorporates into a digital blockchain platform. Am I correct?

Author: hirebits
Title: [ANN] [Small Cap Utility Token] HireBits: Platform for the on-demand economy
Body: We like to call ourselves a digital dis-intermediary, kind of like an Amazon for independent workers and the companies that need them. Our primary differentiation is in the use of the blockchain to automate contracts and foster trust for the gig economy.

Author: hirebits
Title: [ANN] [Small Cap Utility Token] HireBits: Platform for the on-demand economy
Body: In a way, the problem with the gig economy is that it is skewed in favor of the buyer, especially among a vulnerable workforce. Changing that is a cultural issue that is beyond what a startup can do. However, creating a trusted platform that has mechanisms to prevent price undercutting, enforces smart contracts and uses quick arbitration will solve some of these issues.  That's what we do.

Author: hirebits
Title: [ANN] [Small Cap Utility Token] HireBits: Platform for the on-demand economy
Body: Dear All,  We are delighted to join this community. First off, we wanted to share a primer about HireBits and allow the community to explore and share their questions and concerns.  We are a small team but we will try to answer queries here as quickly as we can. We will also continue adding more details (as soon as we figure out how to do so here).    https://cdn-images-1.medium.com/max/2000/1*oc2Vm9Nd2uCabMvsJlP2OA.png  What is HireBits?  HireBits is trying to solve a very specific problem. There are major hurdles in the way the market hires people today: in theory, practice, and medium.  HireBits aims to achieve two things: Intelligently match people with companies and vice versa and transfer control and choice to people as we move towards an on-demand, gig economy.  HireBits is about Data and Analytics and their power to make a positive difference to people’s lives. It is also a platform that helps the modern, independent worker assert control over their work and career, by serving as a trusted platform for the entire ecosystem — from workers to recruiters to consultants to companies.  HireBits is a platform for the on-demand, digital world.  Where can you find more about us?  Website: https://hirebits.co Discord: https://discord.gg/rMTDHg3 Medium: https://medium.com/@HireBitsCo

Author: hirebits
Title: [ANN] [Small Cap Utility Token] HireBits: Platform for the on-demand economy
Body: Adding some details about the HireBits token.  The HireBits Token  The HireBits Token is a utility token. It will serve a role in the HireBits ecosystem as the token of choice. We aim to incentivize the utilization of the token within the platform in several ways. It is an ERC20 token.  Utility  The HireBits platform will be home to a large number of individuals, consultants, companies and institutions. It will also have hundreds of micro services among the different players in the ecosystem. The HireBits utility tokens will be the preferred mode for settling these transactions. For example, if a consultant wants to initiate a transaction to verify the credentials of an individual, the transaction will be settled through a specified number of HireBits tokens.  Where can you find more about us?  Website: https://hirebits.co Discord: https://discord.gg/rMTDHg3 Medium: https://medium.com/@HireBitsCo

Author: hirebits
Title: [ANN] [Small Cap Utility Token] HireBits: Platform for the on-demand economy
Body: HireBits Channels  Website: https://hirebits.co Discord: https://discord.gg/rMTDHg3 Medium: https://medium.com/@HireBitsCo  The HireBits Opportunity  HireBits operates in one of the largest hiring markets in the world. As a digital platform, HireBits is for the world. However, the business behind the platform depends on the number of institutions and companies we can partner with. For that reason, we are focused entirely on one market, India.  The size of the opportunity is close to $1 billion, just in the online and organized recruitment space. We believe we will be a major disruptor in the market. In one of our white papers, we mentioned that we are looking to sign up with at least 50 partners, who will actively source their talent with us. We are steadily making progress towards that goal. It is our belief that these partnerships will help us pilot, test, and enhance the platform, while helping us become profitable within 12 months of the platform launch.    A Word on the Token Sale  Our token sale is still over 20 days away. We will run the sale directly through our website. We are also trying to launch it through KickICO (no conformation from them yet).  As a bootstrapped startup, we are not very big on marketing. All our marketing channels (bitcointalk, medium, discord) are maintained by either vijay, or occasionally Chethan. We would be grateful for inputs from the community for support.

Author: hirebits
Title: [ANN] [Small Cap Utility Token] HireBits: Platform for the on-demand economy

Author: hirebits
Title: [ANN] [Small Cap Utility Token] HireBits: Platform for the on-demand economy
Body: There are thousands of startups and hundreds of ICOs and token sales out there. Everyone claims to be different.  Is HireBits actually different? We'll let you decide. But here is something to convince you we might be.  Analytics is the most important element of the HireBits platform. Unlike most others who consider Analytics as a one size fits all, we started with the assumption that our market has unique characteristics. Today, we have the data and algorithms to prove it. So, our approach is very different from other cookie cutter approaches. The HireBits platform actually needs a blockchain. We are certain we don't need a million dollars to build a functional platform. Frugal innovation.  We do have a slightly more detailed post: https://medium.com/@HireBitsCo/hirebits-is-different-analytics-blockchain-icos-7e94ff89d7ae.  HireBits Channels  Website: https://hirebits.co Discord: https://discord.gg/rMTDHg3 Medium: https://medium.com/@HireBitsCo

Author: hirebits
Title: [ANN] [Small Cap Utility Token] HireBits: Platform for the on-demand economy
Body: Token Economics in the HireBits ecosystem  HireBits tokens are true utility tokens. The platform is host to a lot of micro-services. HireBits tokens will be the ‘currency’ at the heart of many micro-transactions between parties on the platform.  Some of the tokens will be spent to enable users, institutions, and partners for their transactions on the platform. Backers of HireBits can either hold them for future use or trade them on exchanges. A wallet will be integrated in the ecosystem, where users can 'pledge' their tokens. This will be used to ensure liquidity for users who want to purchase the tokens.  The fundamental business behind HireBits will impact the value of the HireBits tokens over time.  You can read more about the economics and opportunities of holding HireBits token in our token specific white paper.  HireBits Channels  Token Sale White paper: https://hirebits.co/docs/Whitepaper-HireBits-Token%20Sale.pdf Website: https://hirebits.co Discord: https://discord.gg/rMTDHg3 Medium: https://medium.com/@HireBitsCo
